functions.solvers package¶

Submodules¶

functions.solvers.Lin_Solver module¶

functions.solvers.Lin_Solver.Lin_Solver(flowRate=50, length=235, diameter=16, feedVol=15, feedConc=0.15, porosity=0.4, henryConst=1.9, disperCoef=12, Nx=30, Nt=3000, time=10800, debugPrint=False, debugGraph=False, full=False)[source]¶

Numerical solver of the EDM with Linear Isotherm - linear parabolic PDE

functions.solvers.Nonlin_Solver module¶

functions.solvers.Nonlin_Solver.Nonlin_Solver(flowRate=500, length=235, diameter=16, feedVol=30, feedConc=0.15, porosity=0.4, langmuirConst=1.5, disperCoef=5, saturCoef=15, Nx=30, Nt=3000, time=3000, denserFeed=True, denseSparseRatio=0.4, debugPrint=False, debugGraph=False, full=False)[source]¶

This script implements Cranck-Nicolson implicit method for numerical solution of non-linear second order convection-diffusion PDE used to describe concentration wave propagation trough the chromatographic column. Numerical scheme utilizes averaged centred difference scheme in spatial direction and forward difference scheme in time direction. Danckwert’s boudaries are implemented with usage of fictious point for left boundary.

functions.solvers.Solver_Choice module¶

functions.solvers.Solver_Choice.Solver_Choice(choice, params, experimentComp, spacialDiff=30, timeDiff=3000, time=10800, debugPrint=False, full=False)[source]¶

Function allowing to choose between solvers based on choice parameter Choices: ‘Lin’ - Lin_Solver ‘Nonlin’ - Nonlin_Solver Other choices will raise an exception.
